title: How it happened
creator_contributor_role: American Telephone and Telegraph Company, production company
subject_group: Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Telegraph lines - Design and construction
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Accidents - Prevention
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Safety education, Industrial
description: Shows common risks and dangers telephone linesmen face resulting generally from negligence of correct safety procedures on their part or that of their fellow workers. A series of sequences provide examples of accidents brought about by one or more of the following basic causes: thoughtlessness, short cuts, poor job planning and arrangement, negligence of safety rules and over-confidence.
